title: Oysters with lime granita

ingredients.content: 1 lime, zest only, no white pith

preparations.content: Place lime zest, sugar and salt into mxing bowl and mill <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add ice cubes and lime juice and blend <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then mix <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>, or until a smooth granita consistency is achieved.
Place a serving platter onto mixing bowl lid, then weigh rock salt or ice onto it. Arrange oysters on top of salt or ice.
Spoon 1-2 teaspoons of the lime granita mixture onto each oyster and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: If you are serving your oysters on rock salt you can weigh the salt onto the serving platter before making the sauce and set it aside. If you are using ice though, you will need to do this right before serving to ensure the ice does not melt.
